comment: Does anybody know why he loses the 3 from the diffusion formula in the end equation for the delta w (FWHM)?
Excellent lectures. can anyone mention a few references on Two-photon absorption?

thanks for the great lectures prof. I am not sure you are right with your argument if your lecture should only be limited to "cold atoms". I have been watching your entire lectures not only to enjoy learning more but ALSO to find answer to some REAL PROBLEMS I am having at work to solve a degradation problem involving light-matter. The unfortunate truth is up to now nothing I can use (maybe) BECAUSE you have narrowed down the lecture to BEC. Danke Schoen sir :-) Happy New Year.
